name: CreateOauthClient
description:
Create a new OAuth client for webhook subscriptions.

Creates an OAuth client for webhook subscriptions, with validation of client credentials. Requires admin or owner permissions and allows up to 10 clients per account.

parameters.name: versioning_header
parameters.description: The `Accept` header used for versioning. Specify the API version.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specify the content type header. Must be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: oauth_client_name
parameters.description: A human-readable name for the OAuth client. It is used to identify the client in a user-friendly manner.

value_schema.description: A human-readable name for the OAuth client

parameters.name: oauth_client_id
parameters.description: The OAuth client ID provided by the OAuth server.

value_schema.description: The OAuth client ID provided by the OAuth server

parameters.name: oauth_client_secret
parameters.description: The client secret provided by the OAuth server for the OAuth client.

value_schema.description: The OAuth client secret provided by the OAuth server

parameters.name: oauth_token_endpoint_url
parameters.description: The URL for the OAuth token endpoint required to obtain an access token.

parameters.name: oauth_grant_type
parameters.description: The OAuth grant type. Currently, only 'client_credentials' is supported.

value_schema.description: The OAuth grant type (currently only client_credentials is supported)

parameters.name: oauth_scopes_requested
parameters.description: The OAuth scopes requested for this client.

value_schema.description: The OAuth scopes requested for this client
